title: real madrid vs athletic club : Real Madrid vs Athletic Club La Liga live streaming : Prediction , kick off , where and how to watch
body_text:
Real Madrid versus Athletic Club La Liga game is scheduled to kick off at 3 pm (ET) on March 31, 2024. The La Liga match will be live streamed on fuboTV.
Real Madrid is likely to win the game against Athletic Club.
La Liga leaders Real Madrid host Athletic Bilbao on Sunday as the Spanish top flight ramps up for an exciting end to the season. Madrid have a firm grip on the title race after shaking free of Catalan minnows Girona before the international break, but Ernesto Valverde's high-flying Athletic will be tricky opposition at the Santiago Bernabeu.
The Basque side, in the Copa del Rey final, are fighting to secure a top four finish and a return to Champions League football next season.
Athletic are fourth, a point clear of Diego Simeone's Atletico in fifth, who face Villarreal on Monday.
FAQs:
Q1. When is Real Madrid vs Athletic Club?A1. Real Madrid versus Athletic Club La Liga game is scheduled to kick off at 3 pm (ET) on March 31, 2024.
Q2. Where can we watch Real Madrid vs Athletic Club?
A2. The La Liga match between Real Madrid and Athletic Club will be live streamed on fuboTV.
